alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 30 at 6:47PM MST until January 31 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...El Paso, Crowley, Kiowa, Bent, and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
